Class AlertBase

                      com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base.DivWidget
                          com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base.AlertBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasStyle, HasType, IsAnimated, IsResponsive, HasCloseHandlers, HasAttachHandlers, HasHandlers, EventListener, HasHTML, HasText, HasVisibility, HasWidgets, HasWidgets.ForIsWidget, IndexedPanel, IndexedPanel.ForIsWidget, InsertPanel, InsertPanel.ForIsWidget, IsWidget, Iterable<Widget>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Alert, AlertBlock
public abstract class AlertBase
extends DivWidget
implements HasHTML, IsAnimated, HasCloseHandlers, HasType

Base class for Alert widgets.

Since:
2.0.2.0
Author:
Dominik Mayer, Carlos Alexandro Becker
See Also:
Bootstrap documentation

Initializes an Alert with a close icon.

public AlertBase(boolean hasClose)
Initializes an Alert with an optional close icon.

Parameters:
hasClose - whether the Alert should have a close icon.

Method Detail

setClose

public void setClose(boolean hasClose)
Sets whether the Alert has a close icon or not.

Parameters:
hasClose - false if you don't want to have a close icon. Default: true

setType

public void setType(Style style)
Sets the type of the Alert.

Specified by:
setType in interface HasType
Parameters:
style -

setType

@Deprecated
public void setType(String typeName)
Deprecated. This method should never be called directly. It will break your implementation if any style names change. The only valid use is inside UiBinder files where it processes the style="..." argument. Use setType(Style) instead!

Sets the type of the Alert based on the Bootstrap class name.

Specified by:
setType in interface HasType
Parameters:
typeName - name of the class to add without the leading "alert-".

setHeading

public void setHeading(String text)
Sets the text of an optional heading. The implementation depends on the subclass.

Parameters:
text - the new heading

setAnimation

public void setAnimation(boolean animated)
Sets whether the Alert should be animated.

Specified by:
setAnimation in interface IsAnimated
Parameters:
animated - true if the Alert should fade out. Default: false

clear

public void clear()
Delete the whole content of the Alert. This includes text, heading and close icon.

Specified by:
clear in interface HasWidgets

setHTMLOutput

protected void setHTMLOutput(String html,
                             String output)
Sets the HTML of the Alert. Override this method to implement a custom formatting.

Parameters:
html - the html of the content without heading and close icon.
output - the raw output to be put into the widget. Be careful!
